text:
nonfatal internal JIT (3.10.107(x)) error 'Relocation error: NULL relocation 
target' has courres in : org/apache/crimson/parser/Parser2.maybeComment (Z)Z': 
Interpreting method.
creator: elaprendiz@550m.com

text:
Seems like a VM problem - try a different ( newer ) JDK. There's nothing we 
can do for internal JIT errors - even if we could find workarounds, it'll be 
bad bacause it may happen with a servlet in a production server - so we're lucky
to find out the VM has a bug sooner :-(
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
